thread.title: Kate McKinnon joins ‘Magic School Bus’ reboot as Ms. Frizzle - NY Daily News
thread.title_full: Kate McKinnon joins ‘Magic School Bus’ reboot as Ms. Frizzle - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Kate McKinnon joins ‘Magic School Bus’ reboot as Ms. Frizzle - NY Daily News
text:
Kate McKinnon has climbed on the Magic School Bus.
The “Saturday Night Live” comedian will voice bus driver Ms. Frizzle in the animated reboot called “Magic School Bus Rides Again.”
Lily Tomlin took on the original red-headed schoolteacher during its initial run from 1994 to 1998.
Producer Stu Stone, who voiced Ralphie in the original show, recently said that the reboot will some familiar voices will be returning.
‘Magic School Bus’ reboot will have ‘tons of cameos' 
Lily Tomlin played the redheaded school teacher in the show's original run from 1994 to 1998. (Morgan, Lauren) “There are tons of cameos planned. I know that there are big stars who want to be involved in this,” he told TMZ last month. “And there’s a whole generation of people who grew up on this series that want to be a part of it now that it’s back.”
Cameos from the show’s four-season run included Swoosie Kurtz, Rosalind Chao, Edward James Olmos, Eartha Kitt, Carol Channing, Dolly Parton, Malcolm McDowell and Dan Marino.
The rebooted educational show will feature a modernized Ms. Frizzle and a new high-tech bus for all of the class’ wild adventures.
A premiere date has not yet been announced.
